project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API, displaying the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Fetch current weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and conditions
Display the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests to validate fetching and displaying weather data functionalities
Execute tests to ensure accuracy and functionality of the implemented features
